00014 QString
00015 IdentityConfig::awayMessage()
00016 {
00017     return currentGroup().readEntry(QLatin1String("AwayMessage"),
00018                                     QString(QLatin1String("/me is away from the computer now.")));
00019 }

00021 QString
00022 IdentityConfig::awayNickname()
00023 {
00024     KUser user(KUser::UseRealUserID);
00025     return currentGroup().readEntry(QLatin1String("AwayNickname"),
00026                                     user.loginName() + QLatin1String("|away"));
00027 }

00048 QString
00049 IdentityConfig::name()

00053 
00054 QStringList
00055 IdentityConfig::nicknameList()
00056 {
00057     KUser user(KUser::UseRealUserID);
00058     QString nickname(user.loginName() + QLatin1Char(',') + user.loginName() + QLatin1String("_,")
00059                      + user.loginName() + QLatin1String("__"));
00060     QString tmp = currentGroup().readEntry(QLatin1String("Nicknames"), nickname);
00061 
00062     return tmp.split(QLatin1Char(','), QString::SkipEmptyParts);
00063 }

00069                                     QString(QLatin1String("Aki IRC Client: %v")));

00079 QString
00080 IdentityConfig::realName()
00081 {
00082     KUser user(KUser::UseRealUserID);
00083     QString name = user.property(KUser::FullName).toString();
00084     if (name.isEmpty() || name.isNull()) {
00085         name.clear();
00086     }
00087 
00088     return currentGroup().readEntry(QLatin1String("RealName"), name);
00089 }
00090

00095                                     QString(QLatin1String("/me is back!")));
00096 }

00122 void
00123 IdentityConfig::setName(const QString& name)
00124 {
00125     if(this->name() != name) {
00126         deleteGroup(this->name());
00127         createGroup(name);
00128     }
00129 }
